{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#f0f4f8'/>
    <rect x='250' y='100' width='300' height='400' rx='10' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#e0e6ed' stroke-width='2'/>
    <text x='400' y='160' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#2d3748' text-anchor='middle'>ログイン</text>
    <rect x='280' y='200' width='240' height='40' rx='5' fill='#edf2f7'/>
    <text x='290' y='225' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#718096'>ユーザー名</text>
    <rect x='280' y='260' width='240' height='40' rx='5' fill='#edf2f7'/>
    <text x='290' y='285' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#718096'>パスワード</text>
    <rect x='280' y='320' width='240' height='40' rx='5' fill='#4299e1'/>
    <text x='400' y='345' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#ffffff' text-anchor='middle'>ログイン</text>
    <text x='400' y='390' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#718096' text-anchor='middle'>パスワードをお忘れの方はこちら</text>
    <text x='400' y='420' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#718096' text-anchor='middle'>新規登録はこちら</text>
    <path d='M300 215 L310 215 M300 275 L310 275' stroke='#718096' stroke-width='2'/>
    <circle cx='505' cy='275' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#718096' stroke-width='2'/>
    <path d='M505 271 L505 279 M501 275 L509 275' stroke='#718096' stroke-width='2'/>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#f5f7fa' />
  
  <rect x='20' y='20' width='760' height='60' fill='#ffffff' rx='8' />
  <text x='40' y='60' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#333333'>イベント一覧</text>
  
  <rect x='600' y='30' width='160' height='40' fill='#4a90e2' rx='20' />
  <text x='625' y='55' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#ffffff'>新規イベント作成</text>
  
  <rect x='420' y='30' width='160' height='40' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#4a90e2' stroke-width='2' rx='20' />
  <text x='445' y='55' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#4a90e2'>カレンダー表示</text>
  
  <rect x='20' y='100' width='760' height='480' fill='#ffffff' rx='8' />
  
  <line x1='20' y1='150' x2='780' y2='150' stroke='#e0e0e0' stroke-width='1' />
  <text x='40' y='135' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>イベント名</text>
  <text x='300' y='135' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>日時</text>
  <text x='500' y='135' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>場所</text>
  <text x='700' y='135' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>参加者数</text>
  
  <rect x='30' y='160' width='740' height='60' fill='#f9f9f9' rx='4' />
  <text x='40' y='195' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>夏季社員旅行</text>
  <text x='300' y='195' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>2023/08/15 10:00</text>
  <text x='500' y='195' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>沖縄</text>
  <text x='700' y='195' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>45/50</text>
  
  <rect x='30' y='230' width='740' height='60' fill='#ffffff' rx='4' />
  <text x='40' y='265' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>新製品発表会</text>
  <text x='300' y='265' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>2023/09/01 14:00</text>
  <text x='500' y='265' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>東京本社</text>
  <text x='700' y='265' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>80/100</text>
  
  <rect x='30' y='300' width='740' height='60' fill='#f9f9f9' rx='4' />
  <text x='40' y='335' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>チームビルディング</text>
  <text x='300' y='335' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>2023/09/10 09:00</text>
  <text x='500' y='335' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>横浜オフィス</text>
  <text x='700' y='335' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>20/30</text>
  
  <circle cx='760' cy='560' r='20' fill='#4a90e2' />
  <text x='755' y='566' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#ffffff'>+</text>
</svg>"
}

{
  "svg": `<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f0f4f8" />
  
  <text x="40" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#2c3e50">イベント作成</text>
  
  <rect x="40" y="80" width="720" height="480" rx="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <text x="60" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">イベント名</text>
  <rect x="60" y="130" width="680" height="40" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <text x="60" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">開催日時</text>
  <rect x="60" y="210" width="320" height="40" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  <rect x="400" y="210" width="140" height="40" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="420" y="235" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#95a5a6">時間選択</text>
  <path d="M510 225 l10 10 l-10 10" stroke="#95a5a6" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
  
  <text x="60" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">場所</text>
  <rect x="60" y="290" width="680" height="40" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <text x="60" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">詳細情報</text>
  <rect x="60" y="370" width="680" height="120" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <rect x="600" y="510" width="140" height="40" rx="20" fill="#3498db"/>
  <text x="645" y="535" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">作成する</text>
  
  <path d="M80 145 l20 0 l0 10 l-10 10 l-10 -10 z" fill="#3498db"/>
  <path d="M80 225 l20 0 l0 10 l-10 10 l-10 -10 z" fill="#3498db"/>
  <path d="M80 305 l20 0 l0 10 l-10 10 l-10 -10 z" fill="#3498db"/>
  
  <circle cx="720" cy="100" r="15" fill="#e74c3c"/>
  <path d="M713 93 l14 14 M727 93 l-14 14" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <path d="M70 385 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M70 405 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M70 425 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10 l10 10 l10 -10" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
</svg>`
}

{
  "svg": `<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f0f4f8" />
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="800" height="60" fill="#3498db" />
  <text x="20" y="38" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#ffffff">イベント詳細</text>
  
  <!-- イベント情報表示エリア -->
  <rect x="40" y="80" width="720" height="200" fill="#ffffff" rx="10" />
  <text x="60" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#2c3e50">イベント名: サマーフェスティバル2023</text>
  <text x="60" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">日時: 2023年8月15日 14:00-18:00</text>
  <text x="60" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">場所: 中央公園</text>
  <text x="60" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">主催者: 山田太郎</text>
  <text x="60" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">参加者数: 42名</text>
  
  <!-- 編集ボタン -->
  <rect x="650" y="90" width="100" height="40" fill="#2ecc71" rx="5" />
  <text x="675" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">編集</text>
  
  <!-- 参加者リスト -->
  <rect x="40" y="300" width="720" height="250" fill="#ffffff" rx="10" />
  <text x="60" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#2c3e50">参加者リスト</text>
  
  <!-- 参加者アイコン (例) -->
  <circle cx="80" cy="380" r="20" fill="#3498db" />
  <circle cx="130" cy="380" r="20" fill="#e74c3c" />
  <circle cx="180" cy="380" r="20" fill="#f39c12" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="380" r="20" fill="#1abc9c" />
  
  <!-- 参加/不参加ボタン -->
  <rect x="60" y="480" width="120" height="40" fill="#2ecc71" rx="5" />
  <text x="85" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">参加する</text>
  
  <rect x="190" y="480" width="120" height="40" fill="#e74c3c" rx="5" />
  <text x="210" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">不参加</text>
  
  <!-- コメント欄 -->
  <rect x="40" y="570" width="720" height="100" fill="#ffffff" rx="10" />
  <text x="60" y="600" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#34495e">コメント:</text>
  <rect x="60" y="610" width="680" height="40" fill="#ecf0f1" rx="5" />
  
  <!-- 送信ボタン -->
  <rect x="680" y="620" width="60" height="30" fill="#3498db" rx="5" />
  <text x="690" y="640" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">送信</text>
</svg>`
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#f0f4f8'/>
    
    <text x='40' y='50' font-size='24' font-weight='bold' fill='#2c3e50'>イベント編集</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='80' width='720' height='480' rx='10' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#e0e6ed' stroke-width='1'/>
    
    <text x='60' y='120' font-size='16' fill='#34495e'>イベント名</text>
    <rect x='60' y='130' width='680' height='40' rx='5' fill='#f8fafc' stroke='#cbd5e1' stroke-width='1'/>
    <text x='70' y='155' font-size='14' fill='#64748b'>テックカンファレンス2023</text>
    
    <text x='60' y='200' font-size='16' fill='#34495e'>開催日時</text>
    <rect x='60' y='210' width='320' height='40' rx='5' fill='#f8fafc' stroke='#cbd5e1' stroke-width='1'/>
    <text x='70' y='235' font-size='14' fill='#64748b'>2023-09-15 10:00</text>
    
    <text x='420' y='200' font-size='16' fill='#34495e'>場所</text>
    <rect x='420' y='210' width='320' height='40' rx='5' fill='#f8fafc' stroke='#cbd5e1' stroke-width='1'/>
    <text x='430' y='235' font-size='14' fill='#64748b'>テックセンター東京</text>
    
    <text x='60' y='280' font-size='16' fill='#34495e'>詳細情報</text>
    <rect x='60' y='290' width='680' height='120' rx='5' fill='#f8fafc' stroke='#cbd5e1' stroke-width='1'/>
    <text x='70' y='315' font-size='14' fill='#64748b'>最新のテクノロジートレンドについて議論するカンファレンスです。</text>
    <text x='70' y='335' font-size='14' fill='#64748b'>AI、ブロックチェーン、IoTなどのセッションを予定しています。</text>
    
    <rect x='60' y='440' width='160' height='40' rx='20' fill='#3498db'/>
    <text x='110' y='465' font-size='16' fill='#ffffff' text-anchor='middle'>更新</text>
    
    <rect x='240' y='440' width='160' height='40' rx='20' fill='#e74c3c'/>
    <text x='290' y='465' font-size='16' fill='#ffffff' text-anchor='middle'>削除</text>
    
    <circle cx='740' cy='100' r='20' fill='#3498db'/>
    <text x='740' y='106' font-size='24' fill='#ffffff' text-anchor='middle'>✎</text>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": `<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f0f4f8"/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="800" height="60" fill="#3498db"/>
  <text x="20" y="38" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#ffffff">イベント管理システム</text>
  
  <!-- カレンダー表示エリア -->
  <rect x="20" y="80" width="760" height="480" rx="10" fill="#ffffff"/>
  
  <!-- 月表示 -->
  <text x="40" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#2c3e50">2023年7月</text>
  
  <!-- 月切り替えボタン -->
  <rect x="600" y="100" width="40" height="30" rx="5" fill="#3498db"/>
  <text x="610" y="122" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#ffffff">◀</text>
  <rect x="650" y="100" width="40" height="30" rx="5" fill="#3498db"/>
  <text x="660" y="122" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#ffffff">▶</text>
  
  <!-- リスト表示切り替えボタン -->
  <rect x="700" y="100" width="60" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2ecc71"/>
  <text x="710" y="122" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">リスト</text>
  
  <!-- カレンダーグリッド -->
  <line x1="40" y1="140" x2="760" y2="140" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">日</text>
  <text x="160" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">月</text>
  <text x="260" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">火</text>
  <text x="360" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">水</text>
  <text x="460" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">木</text>
  <text x="560" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">金</text>
  <text x="660" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">土</text>
  
  <!-- カレンダーの日付とイベント（一部のみ表示） -->
  <text x="60" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#2c3e50">1</text>
  <text x="160" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#2c3e50">2</text>
  <text x="260" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#2c3e50">3</text>
  <rect x="260" y="210" width="80" height="20" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c"/>
  <text x="265" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">社内会議</text>
  <text x="360" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#2c3e50">4</text>
  <text x="460" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#2c3e50">5</text>
  <rect x="460" y="210" width="80" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12"/>
  <text x="465" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">セミナー</text>
  
  <!-- イベントポップアップ -->
  <rect x="100" y="280" width="300" height="200" rx="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="120" y="320" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#2c3e50">社内会議</text>
  <text x="120" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">日時: 2023年7月3日 14:00-16:00</text>
  <text x="120" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">場所: 会議室A</text>
  <text x="120" y="410" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#7f8c8d">参加者: 山田太郎、鈴木花子、佐藤次郎</text>
  <rect x="120" y="430" width="80" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2ecc71"/>
  <text x="135" y="450" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">参加する</text>
  <rect x="210" y="430" width="80" height="30" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c"/>
  <text x="225" y="450" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff">不参加</text>
</svg>`
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#f5f7fa'/>
    
    <!-- ヘッダー -->
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#3498db'/>
    <text x='20' y='38' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#ffffff'>プロフィール</text>
    
    <!-- プロフィール情報 -->
    <rect x='40' y='80' width='720' height='200' rx='10' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#e0e0e0' stroke-width='1'/>
    <image x='60' y='100' width='160' height='160' href='data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAACklEQVR4nGMAAQAABQABDQottAAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==' />
    <text x='240' y='130' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>ユーザー名: 山田太郎</text>
    <text x='240' y='160' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>メールアドレス: yamada@example.com</text>
    <text x='240' y='190' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>所属: 営業部</text>
    <text x='240' y='220' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>趣味: 読書 旅行</text>
    
    <!-- 編集ボタン -->
    <rect x='640' y='240' width='100' height='30' rx='5' fill='#2ecc71'/>
    <text x='670' y='262' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#ffffff' text-anchor='middle'>編集</text>
    
    <!-- 参加予定イベントリスト -->
    <text x='40' y='320' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' font-weight='bold' fill='#333333'>参加予定イベント</text>
    <rect x='40' y='340' width='720' height='240' rx='10' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#e0e0e0' stroke-width='1'/>
    
    <!-- イベントリストアイテム -->
    <rect x='60' y='360' width='680' height='60' rx='5' fill='#f0f0f0'/>
    <text x='80' y='390' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>新年会</text>
    <text x='80' y='410' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>2024年1月5日 19:00-21:00</text>
    <text x='600' y='400' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#3498db'>参加予定</text>
    
    <rect x='60' y='430' width='680' height='60' rx='5' fill='#f0f0f0'/>
    <text x='80' y='460' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>チームビルディング研修</text>
    <text x='80' y='480' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>2024年2月15日 10:00-17:00</text>
    <text x='600' y='470' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#3498db'>参加予定</text>
    
    <rect x='60' y='500' width='680' height='60' rx='5' fill='#f0f0f0'/>
    <text x='80' y='530' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>営業戦略会議</text>
    <text x='80' y='550' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>2024年3月1日 13:00-15:00</text>
    <text x='600' y='540' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#3498db'>参加予定</text>
  </svg>"
}
